creator: DmbMobileApps
descriptionHtml:
To create music you need three components: Melody, Rhythm and Harmony. One of the most difficult parts to create a song is the melody since sometimes we tend to use the same notes without identifying anything new. Melody Creator helps you to generate totally random melodies according to the selected scale and key. This helps you to enhance your creativity when composing your own original melody. With this app, you can edit and change all the melodies that you generate at will or you can create totally new melodies from scratch and play them with different rhythms and instruments.

Join the thousands of users that use melody creator.

With Melody Creator you can:

1. Generate random melodies using a full three-octave span
2. Select the scale of the melody
3. Playback functionality
4. Store your favorite melodies
5. Select among no rhythm, metronome or more than 20 different rhythms that are constantly updated, in order to go with your melody
6. Generate a similar melody based on the one you created before
7. Select from 3 different ranges of randomness to generate your melodies (High randomness may involve abrupt changes in melody notes)
8. Configure the rhythmic complexity in the generated melody (how simple or complex is the combination of notes within a bar)
9. Configure other preferences
10. Create and edit your own melodies
11. Download saved melodies in wav format
12. Change and listen to your melody performed in different instruments such as piano, guitar, sax and other instruments that are constantly updated
13. Choose between 16, 32, 64, 128 notes for your melodies
14. Record your voice into a melody

Melody Creator has a VIP version and a Free version, by getting the VIP version you can:

1. Immediately edit and view the notes of a generated melody
2. Remove all advertisements
3. Download saved melodies in MIDI format
4. Download instruments only available for VIP
5. Download rhythms only available for VIP
6. Change separately the settings of each one of your saved melodies

title: Melody Creator

creator: DmbMobileApps
descriptionHtml:
Melody Creator is a free melody maker for music creators, DJs, and music producers. Melody creator is an easy-to-use melody maker: You need only to touch Create button to create random melodies in your preferred music scale. you can also listen to your new random melody with different instruments and different background rhythms. You can also create your own melodies from scratch.
